Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25, 64-bit, Linux, Ubuntu.

Problem: Cannot exit Mission Control.

Mods installed: Blizzy's Toolbar, AeroKerbin Modified IVA's, AlignedCurrencyIndicator, AmbientLightShifter, Starwaster's AnimatedDecoupler, ASET, AlternativeTreeConfigurator, B9, Taurus HCV, BDArmory, BoxSat, Chatterer, CommunityRecourcePack, CrossfeedEnabler, CustomAsteroids, Deadly Re-entry, DebRefund, Landing Height, DistantObject Enchanter, Editor Extensions, Enchanted NavBall, EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements, Astronomer's Visual pack, Fineprint, Firespitter, Hangar, HGR, KSC++, RPM, KAS, KJR, KerbinSide, Kethane, KethanePlant, KineTechAnimator, Klockheed Martian, Klockheed Martian Special, Kosmodrome, KronalUtils, KSO, KSP-AVC, KSPLua, KW Rocketry, Magic Smoke Industries, MechJeb2, KerbalKonstructs, MissionController 2, ModuleRCSFX, HotRockets, NavBallDockingAlignmentIndicator, NavHud, NEAR, NearFutureConstruction, NearFutureElectrical, NearFuturePropulsion, NearFutureSolar, NearFutureSpacecraft, FinalFrontier, NanoGauges, ORS, ORX, PartCatalog, PlanetShine, ProbeControlRoom, ProceduralFairings, ProceduralParts, QuickRevert, RealChute, ResGen, ResourceOverview, RetroFuture, RLA Stockalike, Romfarer, R&SCapsuledyne, SCANSat, SceneJumper, ScienceAlert, SeriousBusiness, MK2 Cockpit IVA, SmokeScreen, SPD. Stockalike StationPartsExpansion, TantaresLV, Texture Replacer, TAC Life Support, TimeControl, ToadicusTools, Trajectories, TreeLoader, KSPAlternateResourcePanel, TransferWindowPlanner, TweakableEverything, TweakScale, All USI parts, UniversalStorage, VesselView, Virgin Kalactic, VNG, Interstellar, WheelSounds, XanderTek, BackGround Processing, FPS Viewer, ModuleManager 2.5.1.

All the mods are latest versions if not specified.

Reproduction Steps:

Make new career save.

Go to Misson Control.

1. In Mission Control

2. I don't exit from Mission Control. The bar when you are in KSC appears at bottom of the screen. Interstellar science tree notification appears what should be visible only at KSC.

3. Trying to exit using esc menu does nothing.

4. I can enter time warp, just like when im at KSC.

Im also getting other weird UI problems, buttons not working etc.

Edited October 29, 2014 by Shurikeeen

I have seen this before in testing. And many times the issue is because you have a contract with a company logo missing. Or company that was once installed.

Lots of mods add their own company now. Which is cool. The problem is that if you uninstall that mod, and that company logo is loaded into current contracts then this tends to happen.

Thats one thing that can cause this.

Another thing is missing Parts in contracts.

Basically if the contract is looking for something and it is no longer their this will happen.

You can try to clear all contracts with the ALT-12 Contracts tab and try to clear them all out that way. But found that usually once you get to this stage its pretty tough to fix, unless you add back the company logo that might be causing the issue.

Of course this is not the only reason. Usually if its a contract issue, then your contracts freeze up and no new ones show up.

Edited October 29, 2014 by malkuth

You say you're running DebRefund? That isn't updated to 0.25 and will cause issues like this to occur. I would suggest trying without that and seeing if that helps. Providing the logs would help us immensely.
